content.rendered:
Wednesday, November 13, 2024
Today is a “A” Day

Club Meetings and Information

  • Join us for an informational Modified Boys Basketball meeting after school on November 13th in Gym F from 220-235 pm.
  • Voice club meets today in the Chorus room. We will sing through some NYSSMA solos and, if you weren’t able to stay after last week, we will use Pringles again!
  • French Club will meet on Wednesday in room E142. All students are welcome, even if you don’t take French. Please contact Ms. Decker with any questions.
    Attention Pop Culture Icon Club, we will be meeting after school today in the Large Group Room. Please let Ms. Schnorr know if you will need a late bus pass. See you there!
  • Attention students. It is time to redeem your LiveSchool points! The online shop will be open November 12 -the 15th. Orders will be delivered the following week! Keep following the 4 Bs to earn more points and make Maple Avenue a great place to be.
  • It’s National School Psychology Week. This week celebrates the contributions of our school psychologists and the important role they play in our school. Take this opportunity to recognize our school psychologists’ work to help all students thrive in school. Thank you!

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information!

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
